entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Wednesday 22 February 2023
